TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ReadOnlyCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class ReadOnlyCollectionBase Implements ICollection
public ref class ReadOnlyCollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection
type ReadOnlyCollectionBase = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供強類型非泛型唯讀集合的 基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed non-generic read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體一律是唯讀的。A instance is always read-only. 請參閱這個類別的可修改版本。See for a modifiable version of this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們不建議您改用`ReadOnlyCollectionBase`開發新的類別。We don't recommend that you use the `ReadOnlyCollectionBase` class for new development. 相反地，我們建議您先使用一般類別。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 不應使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)GitHub 上。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但是在衍生的類別可以建立他們自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 這個基底類別可簡化實作器建立強型別唯讀自訂集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed read-only custom collection.

para.span: 實作者會擴充這個基底類別，而不是建立自己的建議。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

para.span: 這個基底類別的成員會受到保護，旨在透過衍生類別。

span.span: Members of this base class are protected and are intended to be used through a derived class only.

para.span: 這個類別，讓基礎的集合可透過屬性，只要直接衍生自的類別適用於。

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 在衍生的類別必須確定它自己的使用者無法修改基礎集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

summary.span: 傳回可逐一查看 執行個體的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

para.span: 這個類別，讓基礎的集合可透過屬性，只要直接衍生自的類別適用於。

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 在衍生的類別必須確定它自己的使用者無法修改基礎集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

param.name: array
param.span: 一維 ，是從 複製過來之項目的目的端。

param.span: array 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

span.span: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 從目標陣列的指定索引開始，將整個 複製到相容的一維 。

span.span: Copies the entire to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的陣列必須是相容型別。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 這個方法會使用複製項目。This method uses to copy the elements. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: is .
is less than zero.
is multidimensional.

exception.span: 來源 中的項目數大於 到目的 結尾的可用空間。

span.span: The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 來源 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 的類型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，指出對 物件的存取是否為同步的 (執行緒安全)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to a object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果要同步處理 (執行緒安全) 對 物件的存取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件未同步處理。A object is not synchronized. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步處理的版本類別使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the class using the property. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程的屬性。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 取得可用來同步存取 物件的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to a object.

value.span: 可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本類別使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的屬性物件，不要直接依賴物件。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程的屬性。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
